newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers hold steady in dull trade.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers hold steady in dull trade.

text.p: Singapore bunker quotes held steady in listless trade over Monday blues, traders said.

Enquiries were scarce but suppliers held their recent offers amid gains in crude values and firmness in the cargo market, which has been supported by fresh buying demand from a local trader. Bunker 380-cst supplies were offered at around $100 per tonne while the 380-cst grade was about $3-$4 per tonne higher.
A supplier said he expected trading levels for the 380-cst grade at below $100 per tonne later in the day.
MDO and gas oil were quoted at around $160 and $172 per tonne respectively. --Singapore Newsroom (65-870 3571)
